articles.title: The Supreme Court Just Rolled Democracy Back. You Can Measure How Much. - POLITICO
articles.description: After last Friday, 14 million more Americans will be living under laws they disagree with. How did we get here?
articles.content:
One significant result is easy to see on maps: The United States is becoming more polarized, with a red America and blue America clearly emerging.
But my research also shows another, more worrisome … [+5555 chars]

articles.title: Amber Heard is supposedly the 3rd most beautiful woman in the world - The Star Online
articles.description: The American actress apparently has one of the most beautiful faces in the world, but it is Hadid who supposedly comes closest to perfection.
articles.content: Stop everything! If you thought beauty was subjective, then you're wrong! According to certain (some might say outdated) scientific standards dating back to Antiquity, it's possible to calculate the … [+3352 chars]
